trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint that is pre-configured for discovery operations over a UDP multicast binding.
This endpoint inherits from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> and similarly has a fixed contract and supports two WS-Discovery protocol versions.
In addition, it has a fixed UDP binding and a default address as specified in the WS-Discovery specifications (WS-Discovery April 2005 or WS-Discovery V1.1).
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref>.

Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
The multicast address.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
The multicast address.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.

Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
The multicast address for the UDP discovery endpoint.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.

Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
A <xref:System.Uri> with the multicast address.
The default UDP multicast address for IPv4.
To be added.
The default UDP multicast address for IPv6.
To be added.
Gets or sets the multicast address.
The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.
A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the multicast address.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings"></xref> instance associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings> to change UDP transport settings for the UDP endpoint.
The UDP transport settings for the endpoint.
